captions.text: I came all the way out here to see you!
That's why I flew you to L.A.
Get in here, you freaking weirdo.
Guess who decided to stop buy and not be a total
It is a lot stronger than I remember
Bob and Cyndago are gonna be here tomorrow.
And we're gonna be able to go and have a lot of fun
and make a lot of cool games-Press your button
And then we're gonna be making videos all week long.
Game play, sketch comedy, you name it, we-
It's stronger-I just replaced the batteries.
So anyway, Bob and Cyndago are both going to be here tomorrow.
And they're gonna be joining us for more games
even more fun games. Even more f-
And we're gonna be doing it for your entertainment.
So, stay tuned for a week full of fun.
Oh! Also, did you know that I got pranked?
We just had a grand ole time playing video games so you-
I gotta do it twice now.
Probably on Wade's face. No, on my face.
Somewhere there's a video, it's here or there.
You can click to see the video right now.
Cinco De Pranko-It's almost over because it's
It's stronger than it was before...
So expect more silliness coming in the future.
<i>I didn't know! I thought I had to press it first before you did it</i>
So anyway, thank you again everybody-
And as always, we will see you, in the next video.
How do we shock both of us?
I know! That's what it did!
Like, when I did the thing, it caused me just to
sweat profusely. Like it's just unstoppable.
So you and I can do these videos together.
It will turn green, and whenever it turns green
whoever presses it first doesn't get shocked.
So there's high stakes on this one.
<i>We both payed the price for you screwing up</i>
My hair is probably a mess.
It's off to suck we go.
Be sure to get the balls!
